    • Constructor Detail

      • TabFolder

        public TabFolder(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Shell shell,
                 String connectionString,
                 SolrConnectionType connectionType)
          throws SophieException
        Create a new tab folder containing tab items.
        Parameters:
        shell - Shell.
        connectionString - Connection string displayed on the top right corner of the tab folder.
        connectionType - Connection type displayed on the top right corner of the tab folder.
        Throws:
        SophieException - If no documents, fields or core could not retrieved from Solr.
